completion:
I'm walking down the street, feeling so complete
The sun is shining bright, everything feels right
I hear the birds singing, a beautiful melody
Life is such a wonder, it's a perfect symphony
I close my eyes and let the music take me away
To a place of happiness, where I long to stay
The rhythm in my heart, beats in perfect harmony
With every step I take, I'm dancing to the melody
I'm lost in the music, it's my escape from reality
The lyrics tell a story, of love and of bravery
I sing at the top of my lungs, feeling so alive
Music is my language, it helps me to survive
I'm grateful for the music, it's my guiding light
With every note I play, I find my path in life
Music is my passion, it's what I was born to do
I'll keep playing and singing, with all my heart and soul
